data.lyric:
[ti:Dawn FM]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.35]Dawn FM - The Weeknd
[00:01.34]Lyrics by：Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:02.61]Composed by：Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:03.67]
[00:24.73]This part I do alone
[00:30.74]I'll take my lead
[00:32.61]I'll take my lead on this road
[00:37.13]
[00:39.91]And I need something to hold
[00:46.29]Make me believe in make beliefs
[00:49.85]
[00:50.50]'Cause after the light is it dark
[00:53.05]Is it dark all alone
[00:56.80]
[00:58.10]All alone
[01:03.66]
[01:04.26]Jim Carrey：
[01:05.40]
[01:07.23]You are now listening to 103.5 Dawn FM
[01:10.56]
[01:11.26]You've been in the dark for way too long
[01:13.47]It's time to walk into the light
[01:14.85]And accept your fate with open arms
[01:16.84]
[01:17.39]Scared
[01:17.82]
[01:18.37]Don't worry
[01:18.80]
[01:19.41]We'll be there to hold your hand and guide you through this painless transition
[01:22.92]
[01:23.73]But what's the rush
[01:24.47]
[01:25.01]Just relax and enjoy another hour of commercial *free yourself* music on 103.5 Dawn FM
[01:31.64]Stay tuned
